players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am shocked and saddened by Bob's sudden demise. Let us all work together to find out who did this heinous deed."

Charlie: "I agree with Diana that we should work together to find the culprit. However, let us not forget that one of us is a mafioso and may try to mislead us. I will be paying close attention to their words and actions."

Charlie: "I think we should all focus on finding clues and information that could help us identify the mafioso among us. Let's try to gather as much evidence as possible before making any accusations."

Diana: "I believe that we should all remain vigilant and keep an open mind as we continue our investigation. Let us remember that trust is earned, not given easily. I will do my best to provide any information or clues that come to my attention."
